name: DecentralizedAutonomousTrust
description: Decentralized Autonomous Trust This contract is a modified version of the implementation provided by Fairmint for a Decentralized Autonomous Trust as described in the continuous organization whitepaper (https://github.com/c-org/whitepaper) and specified here: https://github.com/fairmint/c-org/wiki.
